Russia will be asked for ceasefire during Olympics, Macron tells Ukraine interviewerRussia will be asked to observe a ceasefire in Ukraine during the Paris Olympics, French President Emmanuel Macron said in an interview from Paris shown on Ukrainian television and posted by a Ukrainian journalist on her YouTube channel on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 22:55:58 GMT APJI46ZD6FNWZMIOAR5VJA5I2U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-will-be-asked-ceasefire-during-olympics-macron-tells-ukraine-interviewers-2024-03-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Niger revokes military accord with US, junta spokesperson saysNiger's ruling military junta has revoked with immediate effect a military accord that allows military personnel and civilian staff from the U.S. Department of Defense on its soil, junta spokesperson Colonel Amadou Abdramane said on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 21:28:46 GMT JCH6K4UI4RLI5DDC3CZM6H4FQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/niger-revokes-military-accord-with-us-junta-spokesperson-says-2024-03-16/Boureima Balima, Bate Felix世界非洲
Iceland volcano erupts again, spewing fountains of lavaA volcano in Iceland erupted on Saturday for the fourth time since December, the country's meteorological office said, spewing smoke and bright orange lava into the air in sharp contrast against the dark night sky. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 20:53:46 GMT FLKLVHX375IPDOH5DRSB2KKGOE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/iceland-volcano-erupts-again-with-office-says-2024-03-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Venezuela's Maduro announces candidacy for July re-electionVenezuela's President Nicolas Maduro will run for a second re-election to secure another six-year term in voting planned for July 28, the ruling Socialist party said on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 19:35:37 GMT MCJRGROAU5PW7HYCD7X2QRZWJM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/venezuela-maduro-run-presidential-election-set-july-socialist-party-says-2024-03-16/Mayela Armas世界美洲
Bolsonaro says he does not fear being put on trialBrazil's former President Jair Bolsonaro said on Saturday he does not fear being put on trial, one day after a police investigation revealed the far-right politician tried to co-op the country's military chiefs in a coup plan to overturn his 2022 election defeat. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 18:29:36 GMT DXX6U4UZBFNPNLYPZBIQYVKI74 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazilian-rightist-bolsonaro-says-he-does-not-fear-being-put-Trial-2024-03-16/Reuters世界美洲
Israel prepares return to ceasefire talks; UN says Gaza hunger crisis worsensThe main U.N. aid agency operating in Gaza said on Saturday that acute malnutrition was accelerating in the north of the Palestinian enclave as Israel prepared to send a delegation to Qatar for new ceasefire talks on a hostage deal with Hamas. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 15:58:45 GMT QL35OKJMNRJZRDQHGMI5FY74YM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-attends-new-ceasefire-talks-un-says-gaza-hunger-crisis-worsens-2024-03-16/Andrew Mills, Maayan Lubell世界中东地区
Germany calls for large-scale aid access to Gaza as Scholz heads to IsraelGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz urged Israel on Saturday to allow humanitarian aid access to Gaza on a larger scale, ahead of a two-day trip to the Middle East. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 14:52:27 GMT IM7IONLUFNMV5MZZ5CWVZSA7HI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/germany-calls-large-scale-aid-access-gaza-scholz-heads-israel-2024-03-16/Reuters世界欧洲
Two injured in BBQ eatery blast in eastern ChinaTwo people were injured on Saturday after a powerful blast at a barbecue shop in the eastern Chinese city of Huaian, local authorities said, the latest incident to spur calls for better restaurant-safety checks across the country. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 13:52:38 GMT EBBUZ7QO5FLPBKJ6RYDRPREWIY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/two-injured-bbq-eatery-blast-eastern-china-2024-03-16/Reuters世界中国
Second aid shipment for Gaza ready to sail from Cyprus, says its presidentA second cargo of food aid was ready to depart by sea from Cyprus to Gaza on Saturday, the island's president said, after a first aid shipment landed in the besieged Palestinian enclave overnight. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 13:27:37 GMT LROLFBJCS5LNLF27G7C7JJXFRY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-ready-to-sail-second-aid-shipment-cyprus-says-its-president-2024-03-16/Reuters世界中东地区
Mossad chief expected to resume Gaza ceasefire talks in Doha on SundayThe head of Israeli intelligence is expected to lead ceasefire talks with mediators which resume in Qatar on Sunday in direct response to a new proposal from Hamas, a source close to the talks told Reuters on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 13:13:22 GMT KKBPKZ4TWVLJLDG6NQGECY2L2I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/mossad-chief-expected-resume-gaza-ceasefire-talks-doha-sunday-2024-03-16/Reuters世界中东地区
Freed from jail, Senegal opposition presidential candidate draws hundreds to first eventA day after his release from jail, Senegal opposition leader Bassirou Diomaye Faye drew hundreds of supporters at his first public appearance as a presidential contender on Friday for March 24 elections, promising to tackle corruption. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 11:50:10 GMT VHJTXYAXPRMQHFKZF6WNMHD5CM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/freed-jail-senegal-opposition-presidential-candidate-draws-hundred-first-event-2024-03-16/Sofia Christensen, Bate Felix世界非洲
